item.title: Welcome to The Snowman Online
item.description: The Snowman Online is dedicated to helping flakes around the world with the Snowflake cloud data warehouse. The site will provide a series of blogs, tutorials and amusement for you all to enjoy and hopefully further your careers with this amazing technology. I am just a simple Snowman. I don’t have any affiliations and my goal is just to assist and have some fun along the way. I’m always looking to improve the site so please do provide any feedback that you think may help and if you have a question please send me a mail or contact me over on twitter.
item.content:
The Snowman Online is dedicated to helping flakes around the world with the Snowflake cloud data warehouse. The site will provide a series of blogs, tutorials and amusement for you all to enjoy and hopefully further your careers with this amazing technology.

I am just a simple Snowman. I don’t have any affiliations and my goal is just to assist and have some fun along the way. I’m always looking to improve the site so please do provide any feedback that you think may help and if you have a question please send me a mail or contact me over on twitter.

Happy flaking.

Ted (The Snowman)
